attributes.action: Give 10 Downing Street a name such as 'Britannia House'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our elected head of government's official residence should have an official name and not just an address. Other nation's heads of government have official residences with names and so should ours. In broadcast items referring to the Prime Ministers Official Residence the whole world would know where 'Britannia House' is and know who lives and works there. When referring to the USA president’s official residence correspondents have no need to refer to it as 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue Washington DC, referring to it as the 'White House' is sufficient to convey the full meaning of where the USA president lives and works.
